Text: Oñ i fʼita kpa ñwu ma alu kʼi dukpe̩ kʼamone̩ achadua e̩gba du, uhia ki we ehia ma;
i kakini, Akajo̩ ki ma railo O̩jo̩ n dʼef ewoʼka, one̩ la wʼo̩ eju n.
Oñ o̩yaukuo̩ko̩ʼka dʼef ewo kide̩; i te̩tawʼugbo-wñ o̩gbe̩nugbe̩ aka ñw u kakini, Fʼache̩ na mi ugbo e̩no̩la-mi.
Tak abu kʼi ma dʼowñ e̩do̩ n gboo̩gbo; ama ubi le̩ i ka ef e̩do̩-wñ kakini, Dagba u ma railo O̩jo̩ n, kʼone̩ ma la wʼomi eju n;
ama todabu kʼo̩yaukuo̩ko̩-i ache mi akanya-i, nanʼache̩-wñ tode̩gba kʼewa kʼi awa o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩ adʼumi te̩ agwoli gwoku.
Oñ Ondu kakini, Me̩ nagbo̩ e̩wñ kʼakajo̩ uji le̩ aka ke.
Oñ i ma nʼugbo du kʼO̩jo̩ anʼache̩ abo-wñ kʼi tutane̩ ku ma jʼakwadʼo̩ o̩ro̩ka kpai odu n? E̩do̩ i muda aje̩ ugbo ma le̩.
Naka ñwu me̩, kakini, Owñ anʼache̩ ma piopio. Ama e̩gba kʼO̩ma One̩ lewa i ñʼali e̩do̩-e̩kono̩ oj ane̩-ile̩-i?
Oñ i fʼita-i kpa ugbo abo iche̩ka ku ma ke̩do̩nʼo̩la-ma ka kʼama chʼame̩no̩kpakpa, ma la do̩ abo ki bo̩ du rʼibe̩te̩.
I kakini, One̩ meji mute̩gu nyʼunyi O̩jo̩ ku ma chadua; oka efu ma chʼiFarisi, ekeji-wñ la chʼagbo̩kane̩.

E̩ne̩ Farisi le̩ kwodago achadua abe̩-i kpai o̩la-wñ: i kakini, O̩jo̩, nagwʼe̩ ukpe̩ kʼu ma dab abo ki bo̩ n, amagba-e̩wñ-afuma, amachuji, amatene o̩ya one̩, i chaka chʼalu kʼagbo̩kane̩-i de̩, u dabe̩le̩ n.
Najalu onu meji tak o̩jo̩ mebie ñwa; e̩wñ du kʼu ne̩ nakpe̩ rʼe̩gwa kʼu dʼukpe̩ʼka chele.
Ama agbo̩kane̩ le̩ kwodago o̩najiji; i chaka chʼe-eju ekorʼojale i je̩ che n; i muda dʼo̩wo̩ fiʼe̩do̩-wñ, i kakini, O̩jo̩, e̩do̩ kʼi nyʼe̩ ñw omi kʼu chʼe̩nadure.
Naka ñwu me̩ kakini, e̩ne̩-i mugwo̩ru kwʼo̩mo̩ le tʼunyi-wñ kpai ale eje̩ ñw e̩nekeji le̩, todu e̩ne̩ du kʼi ahi o̩la-wñ ne ma ahi u wane̩; ama e̩ne̩ kʼi hiʼo̩la-wñ wane̩ ma ahi u dago.
Ma la jʼakʼamo̩me̩kpa-ma wʼugbo owñ, todu kʼi do̩wo̩kado ma ge̩; oñ abu kʼamako̩che̩ fʼu li, ma dejuru ma.
Ama Jisus fʼuma do̩ wʼugbo-wñ, i kakini, Me̩ to̩no̩ kʼabimo̩to̩ kekele ki wʼugbo mi, me̩ ki la kpo̩na nyʼuma n: todu ojane̩ O̩jo̩ chʼe-abe̩go̩-i.
Ami, naka ñwu me̩ kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ du ma gba ojane̩ O̩jo̩ alu kʼimo̩to̩ kekele agba e̩wñ n, i nʼugbo du kʼi agudu tef uwñ n.
Tak agbojiʼka tʼowñ ene kakini, Akone̩wñ, uwe̩ e̩ne̩nyo̩, e̩wñ nache kʼiñmi ogbegbele̩ amud e̩wñ ogu kʼu naje̩?
Oñ Jisus ka ñw u kakini, E̩wñ chi kʼe̩ do̩ mi kʼe̩ne̩nyo̩? E̩ne̩ du nyo̩ n, chai e̩ne̩ kate, owñ chʼO̩jo̩.
Uwe̩ chema o̩la uko̩ le̩, E̩ ki tene o̩ya e̩ne̩ omune̩ n, e̩ ki kpʼone̩ n, e̩ ki joji n, e̩ ki gbibenu olemi n, e̩ bumo̩ ata-we̩ kpai iye-we̩.
Tak i kakini, U fʼe̩wñ-i du de kwʼe̩gba kʼu chʼimo̩to̩ okolobia.
Oñ abu ku Jisus gbo̩, i ka ñw u kakini, E̩wñʼka bo̩ ñw e̩ ta, mʼe̩wñ du kʼe̩ ne̩ ko ta, kʼe̩ mʼu ko kpe̩ ñw ame̩nale, oñ uwe̩ anʼe̩wñ akoko efojale: tak e̩ lewa, tʼumi ubi.
Oñ abu kʼi gbo̩ e̩wñ-i, i mud e̩do̩-e̩kpabie̩ ñw u nana, todu kʼanana-wñ tabale.
Oñ abu ku Jisus li u i kakini, Me̩ go abu kʼi gbiti ñw abo ku ma nʼe̩wñ-eku nana ku ma gudu nyʼef ojane̩ O̩jo̩.
Todu i me̩ ñw inyakulumi kʼi gudu lef awo ebije uge̩wñ tʼanana egudu nyʼef ojane̩ O̩jo̩ le.
Oñ abo ku ma gbo̩ kakini, Mak e̩ne̩ ma neke ajadu ke?
I muda kakini, E̩wñ ki ma je̩ ache ñw amone̩ n, je̩ ache ñw O̩jo̩.
Oñ Pita kakini, Go, a tʼe̩wñ e-wa no̩ me̩, a la tʼuwe̩ ubi-i.
Oñ i ka ñwu ma, kakini, Ami, naka ñwu me̩, ka kʼi nʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi tʼunyi abe̩k o̩ya abe̩k amo̩maye abe̩k abo ki bi owñ abe̩k amo̩ma no̩ tod ojane̩ O̩jo̩
e-ki ma agba e̩wñ wewe tʼe-le̩ le ef adiko kide̩ n, tak ef o̩kpanachi ki awa-i i ñʼagba iñmi ogbegbele̩.
Tak i mʼamame̩gweji le̩ ko oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ go, a ate̩gu nyi Je̩rusale̩m, tak o̩la O̩ma One̩ du ki che̩ko̩tane̩ lef amakache̩ achekpoji.
Todu ma adʼowñ ñw abo uche̩ichi mu, ma achʼo uke̩, ma akpʼowñ bie̩, ma la afiʼito̩ rʼowñ o̩la;
taku ma ajʼowñ edili, ma la akpʼo̩ tinyo, tak o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩ta-wñ i udajikwane̩ ge̩.
Eju-ma la ne̩m o̩la-i du n; o̩la kʼi ka le̩ la chemaja ñwu ma, ma la ma e̩wñ kʼi ka le̩ n.
Oñ i leatu, eme̩ru kʼi me̩ru Je̩riko awa, afejuʼka gugu eti o̩na abiebi.
Tak abu kʼi gbo̩ ekuku o̩wo̩-amone̩ ku ma lale, i tene e̩wñ ki chʼofe-wñ.
Oñ ma fʼuka je̩ ñw u kakini, Jisus abo Nazare̩t le̩ alale.
Tak i kwokwa kakini, Jisus, uwe̩ O̩ma Defid, lʼumi ejumomi.
Tak abo ku ma jʼo̩gba dejurʼu kʼi chechi: i muda nakwa tule nyo̩gba nana kakini, Uwe̩, O̩ma Defid, lʼumi ejumomi.
Taku Jisus kwodago, oñ i je̩ ñwu ma mʼu du wʼugbo owñ. Oñ abu kʼi me̩rʼu, i tʼowñ ene kakini,
E̩wñ dʼuwe̩ e̩do̩ kʼu nache ñw e̩? Tak i kakini, Ondu, todu kʼomi kʼu gane̩.
Taku Jisus ka ñw u kakini, Gane̩ ke; e̩do̩-ekono-we̩ fʼe̩ jadu me̩.
Oñ e̩re̩re̩le̩ i kwogane̩, i la tʼowñ ubi, i nadojima ñw O̩jo̩: oñ abu kʼamone̩ le̩ chaka li u, ma nañwulo̩ O̩jo̩.
